roles.title: Full Stack and Mobile App Trainee

projects.description: Compared multiple ML models to predict water potability; best model achieved 92% accuracy.

projects.description: Built an ML-powered API to recommend best crops and predict yield based on soil, climate, and accurate values.

projects.description: Built a CNN model to classify music genres from raw audio files; achieved 87% classification accuracy.

projects.name: Hoodigo - Frontend Website
projects.description: Created a stylish responsive frontend using modern UI/UX design patterns.

leadership_justification: Special Mention – Intel OneAPI India Hackathon 2024 for developing an AI-driven platform for hospitals.
candidate_fit_summary: Ronnie A Jeffrey is a skilled software developer with experience in AI, machine learning, and full-stack development. However, their background does not align with the requirements for a General Physician role.
eligibility_reason: The candidate lacks an MBBS or equivalent medical degree, a valid medical license, and clinical experience required for the General Physician role.
